product_name: Canada Oval Laser Engraved Water Bottle Customizable Polar Camel Stainless Steel with Straw - country code cdn euro Dark Gray 32 oz
description: These water bottles have a permanent laser engraved image with optional custom text to make it personalized just for you or your loved ones. Polar Camel drinkware is made with double wall, vacuum insulated construction to provide excellent heat and cold retention. The lid features a flip top, a soft rubber finger hold, and a rigid and removable straw for easy cleaning. All engraving and customization (if applicable) are done right here in Los Angeles, CA. The laser engraving beats the performance of a simple sticker or decal on a bottle… the image is permanent. Polar Camel drinkware is BPA and lead free with performance that rivals or beats competing brands of drinkware. Not dishwasher safe. Twice the heat and cold retention of a standard travel mug. 32 ounce dimensions are 3.70 inches by 3.70 inches by 10.25 inches.
